section.para: The module ngx_http_flv_module does special processing of the transmitted files: when transmitting a file starting from the offset specified by the “start=XXX” arguments in the request line, it adds FLV header before the requested file.
This module is not built by default, it should be enabled with the --with-http_flv_module configuration parameter.

directive.name: flv
directive.para: Enables special processing of the transmitted files.
